entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High 10. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Local amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
